name: Thief Santa
description:
A Game where you play as Santa but instead of giving out presents you steal them

Your goal is to steal presents from houses while avoiding the people living inside the house.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

CTRL - C - Crouch

E (While close to a present) - Pick Up

_______________________________________________________________

After you have successfully stolen all the presents you need to go back to the exit to complete the game.
